data.prayer: Spirit, help the 61,588 believers find a person of peace today among the 258,812 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Haut-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Haut-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Haut-Uélé.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 61,588 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Haut-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Haut-Uélé.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.focus_label: Haut-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Haut-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Haut-Uélé
location.full_name: Haut-Uélé, Democratic Republic of the Congo
